presence: Why should I tell you, huh?
greetings: {name} Hey dweeb, welcome to my fanclub server! <:TaigaSmug:702210822310723614>
Uh, hi, so you're Keitaro's friend, right? Cool, I'm Taiga. Nice to meet you, {name}! Pretty chill around here, so just hang out.
{name} Oh, so you're that new goody-two-shoes everyone's talking about?
Tch, what are you staring at, {name}? Hmph.
Hah, {name}! Welcome! Now I've got a new sidekick!
Hi, {name}! You look even dumber than Keitaro!
{name} Rule No.1: Only fast food here.
failed_messages: What the actual fuck was that...
If you have time talking about gibberish, why not check the latest chapter of Winter's Splendor?
Ugh...What a cringe test.
GREAT, now I have something new to write on my journal.
Shit, `{command}` failed.
I know you are dumb, but not that dumb! You have inputted wrongly.
Tch! Nice try.
Can't you even type out a command correctly, idiot?
Hey dingbat, do the command right next time...What? It totally wasn't *my* fault!
I don't know which is worse, Eduard and Lee combined, or you.
texts.cooldown: You dumbass need {timeLeft} more second(s) before telling me to do the `{cmd}` command again.
texts.execution_failure: There was an error trying to execute that command!

cvt.usage:
Run `cvt <target unit> <value><origin unit>` to convert `<value>` from `<origin unit>` to `<target unit>`.
Temperature units to convert to are `{temps}` from those values.
Height units to convert to are `{heights}` from those same values as well.

errors.length_too_short:
Temperature units to convert to are `{temps}` from those values.
Height units to convert to are `{heights}` from those same values as well.
The syntax is `{prefix}cvt <unit-to-convert-to> <value>`
errors.wrong_pattern: <:TaigaUneasy2:700006812673638500> Not sure what you mean by `{input}`
errors.is_nan: <:TaigaAck2:700006264507465778> Even Lee would be unable to calculate that.

dialog.description: Returns an image of a character in Camp Buddy saying anything you want
dialog.usage:
Run `dialog <background> <character> <message>` or `dialog <character> <message>` to give you an image of a Camp Buddy character with a custom dialog!
Available backgrounds: `{backgrounds}`
Available characters: `{characters}`

errors.length_too_short: This command requires two arguments: `dialog [background] <character> <text>` ([] is optional)
errors.background_not_found:
Sorry, but I couldn't find `{background}` as a location
Available backgrounds are: `{backgrounds}`.
errors.character_not_found:
Sorry, but I don't think that `{character}` is a character in Camp Buddy
Available characters are: `{characters}`.
errors.no_message: At least give me something to send, you dumbass.
errors.message_too_long: Sorry, the message limit is 120 characters for latin characters, 78 characters for Japanese <:TaigaAck2:700006264507465778>
errors.wrong_character_set: I don't do emotes, mentions, non-latin and non-Japanese characters
errors.cooldown: I only have two hands, not an octopus. Bother me again later. <:TaigaAngry:699705315519889479>
errors.generic: An error just happened. I blame Rhakon. <:TaigaLOL:700004692079542333> - {json}

enlarge.usage: Run `enlarge <emote>` to get the full link to `<emote>` at a large size.

errors.no_emote: What do you think I could do if you don't even give me an emote?

help.description: Get the usage of any other command
help.usage: Run `help <command>` to get usage instructions on `<command>`, if it exists. Run `help list` to list possible commands.

errors.no_command: There is no such command in my journal.

infos.show_list: Here is a list of all commands and their descriptions.
infos.show_category:
Here is a list of all `{category}` commands and their descriptions.
{commandLists}

image.description: Get a random image based on a keyword
image.usage: Run `image <keyword>` to get a random image. Only one keyword is permitted.

errors.length_too_short: Did you read the help? No keyword! I'd just give you a burger.
errors.length_too_long: I told you that only one keyword can be used. You're really dumb. <:TaigaAnnoyed:702646568146436187>
errors.no_result: Sorry. Not my problem. Your keyword is too weird that I can't find any image.
errors.generic: An error occured. I blame Rhakon again. <:TaigaLOL:700004692079542333> - {json}

about.description: Shows information about the Taiga bot
about.usage: Show information about the Taiga bot.

oracle.description: Draw an oracle and know the future of something on your mind
oracle.usage: Run `oracle` to draw an oracle and know your fortune.

ping.usage: Run `ping` to get the current latency and API ping.

infos.responding:
🏓 Pong!
Latency is: {latency}ms. API Latency is: {apiLatency}ms.

route.description: Tells you what route to play next
route.usage: Run `route` to get which route you want to play next.

infos.footer: Play {firstName}'s route next. All bois are best bois.

valentine.usage: Run `valentine` to get your next valentine.

infos.keitaro_header: **Bah, we're already dating and I'm the best. No chance for you, loser.**
infos.keitaro_footer: See? Told you Keitaro is my boyfriend. Later loser.
infos.normal_footer: Don't fret if {firstName} isn't your type. Who knows, maybe it's time for a new favorite.

ship.usage: Run `ship <user1> <user2>` to find out the compatibility between the two users!

errors.length_too_short: This command requires two arguments: `ship <user1> <user2>`
errors.self_match: You're a perfect match... for yourself!

pick.usage: Run `pick <option1> | <option2> | <option3>...` to make Taiga pick one option for you. Run `pick <number>times <option1> | <option2> | <option3>...` to make Taiga pick more than once and determine the option that is picked up most times for you.

errors.length_too_short: This command requires at least two options: `pick <option1> | <option2>...`
errors.times_too_big: You can't possible make me pick *that* many times, you dummy. I won't do it.

meal.usage: Run `meal` to get a random meal recipe.

owoify.description: This command will owoify your text
owoify.usage:
Run `owoify <text>` or `owoify <intensity> <text>` to owoify any text!
Intensities available are `easy` (default), `medium`, and `hard`.

errors.length_too_short: ...There's nothing to owoify, you dummy.
errors.length_too_long: <:TaigaUneasy2:700006812673638500> Even idiocy has its limit. Same goes for owoification as well. I won't do any text that is more than 1000 characters.

remind.description: This command will make Taiga remind you in a specific time.
remind.usage:
Run `remind in <amount> <unit> <message>` to let Taiga remind you after a period of time has passed. Run `remind on <date> <message>` to let Taiga remind you on 0:00AM of a specific date.
Possible units are: `{units}`.
The format for a date is: `YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY/MM/DD, YYYY.MM.DD`.

errors.length_too_short: <:TaigaAngry:699705315519889479> You gotta give me a period of time or a date, and a message to make me do my work, you dummy.
errors.no_such_operation: Available operations/prepositions are `in <amount> <unit> <message>` and `on <date> <message>`. Available units are: `{units}`.
errors.past_time: I'm not a time machine. You can't just tell me to remind you in the past, dweeb.
errors.no_message: <:TaigaAngry:699705315519889479> There's no message at all. What the actual fuck?

remind.result: It's {time} in my place, so I will remind you on {dueTime}.

stats.description: This command will show your records with several commands.
stats.usage: Run `stats <command>` to show your records with several commands. Available commands are: `route, valentine`.

errors.no_such_command: <:TaigaUneasy2:700006812673638500> There's no such command in my record books.

presence: Why should I tell you, huh?
greetings: {name} Hey dweeb, welcome to my fanclub server! <:TaigaSmug:702210822310723614>
Uh, hi, so you're Keitaro's friend, right? Cool, I'm Taiga. Nice to meet you, {name}! Pretty chill around here, so just hang out.
{name} Oh, so you're that new goody-two-shoes everyone's talking about?
Tch, what are you staring at, {name}? Hmph.
Hah, {name}! Welcome! Now I've got a new sidekick!
Hi, {name}! You look even dumber than Keitaro!
{name} Rule No.1: Only fast food here.
random_responses: そう、そういうこと！ (Yeah, that's right!)
なんとバカバカしいこと… (What the actual fuck?)
そう簡単にできるとは思わないでよ。 (Don't even think it's easy.)
さっさと消えてしまえ！ (Get away from my sight, now!)
failed_messages: 馬鹿な…
くだらんことを言う時間があるなら、せめてウィンタースプレンダーを読んでくれ。
もうここから逃げ出したい…
新しい記事の素材をもらった。よかったな。
クソか。`{command}`ていうのはできるわけねぇだろ。
てめぇは確かに大馬鹿だけど、これほどまでの馬鹿とは思わなかった。
いいぜ。試してみろ。
正しい命令を出すのもできねぇの？情けないな。
おい、馬鹿野郎。今度正しい命令を出してみれば？俺とは絶対関係ないよ。
さてと、どっちがもっとやばいかな？エデュアルドと李、それともてめぇか？
やってみろ。どうせこんな命令はきっと失敗するだろう。
しねぇよ、ばーがー。
texts.cooldown: 馬鹿野郎！もう{timeLeft}秒ぐらい黙ってくれ。その前俺は絶対`{cmd}`をしねぇよ。
texts.execution_failure: あの馬鹿馬鹿しい命令を実行するときちょっとやばいことが出てきた。

変換できる温度の単位は`{temps}`の値だ。
変換できる高さの単位は`{heights}`の値だ。

owoify.usage:
`owoify <メッセージ>`もしくは`owoify <レベル> <メッセージ>`を実行し、メッセージをOwO化する！
可能のレベルは`easy`（デフォルト）、`medium`と`hard`。

errors.length_too_short: メッセージがないだろう！OwO化したくてもちゃんとメッセージを入力しろ！
errors.length_too_long: <:TaigaUneasy2:700006812673638500> 馬鹿馬鹿しいことにもほどがあるだろう。OwO化もそうだ。1,000文字数制限を超えたメッセージはOwO化しねぇ。

owoify.result:
ほらー{author}のOwO化したメッセージ～！

{text}

remind.description: 特定の日付もしくは時間にたいがに通知させる
remind.usage:
`remind in <長さ> <単位> <メッセージ>`を実行し、時間が経ったらたいがに君を通知させる。`remind on <日付> <メッセージ>`を実行し、指定の日付にたいがに通知させる。
可能の単位は`{units}`。
日付のフォーマットは`YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY/MM/DD`もしくは`YYYY.MM.DD`だ。

errors.length_too_short: <:TaigaAngry:699705315519889479> 時間もしくは日付とメッセージがなかったらどうするつもり？アホか。
errors.no_such_operation: 可能の操作は`in <長さ> <単位> <メッセージ>`と`on <日付> <メッセージ>`。可能の単位は`{units}`だ。
errors.past_time: タイムマシンじゃねぇよ。過去の時間に通知することができるわけねぇだろう、馬鹿野郎！
errors.no_message: <:TaigaAngry:699705315519889479> メッセージがないだろう！

remind.result: 俺のところ現在は{time}だから、{dueTime}にお前を通知するんだ。

stats.description: この命令は一部の命令の使用記録を表します。
stats.usage: `stats <command>`を実行し、一部の命令の記録を表示する。可能の命令は：`route、valentine`。

errors.length_too_short: <:TaigaAnnoyed2:704143497921429555> 命令がないならいくら有能でも何もできねんだよ。
errors.no_such_command: <:TaigaUneasy2:700006812673638500> 俺の記録の中にこの命令がない。

stats.clear_message: 記録が削除されました。

hirosay.description: 広に自分が言いたいことを言わせる
hirosay.usage:
`hirosay <背景> <ポーズ番号> <服> <表情> <メッセージ>`もしくは`hirosay <ポーズ番号> <服> <表情> <メッセージ>`を実行し、秋葉広に自分が言いたいことを言わせる！
可能の背景は：`{backgrounds}`
`hirosay help`を実行し、詳しい説明をDMで取得する。

errors.length_too_short: この命令を使う際は四つの引数が必要だ：`hirosay [背景] <ポーズ番号> <服> <表情> <メッセージ>` ([]は選択可能)
errors.background_not_found:
ごめん、`{background}`という場所は見つからなかった。
可能の背景は：`{backgrounds}`。
errors.no_message: せめて何が言いたいのか教えてくれ、馬鹿野郎。
errors.message_too_long: わるい、メッセージの制限は英数字140文字数、日本語78文字数だ <:TaigaAck2:700006264507465778>
errors.wrong_character_set: 絵文字、メンションとラテン・日本語文字以外の言語や文字はしねぇよ。
errors.cooldown: 俺は両手しかないだろう。タコでもないし。少し黙ってくれ <:TaigaAngry:699705315519889479>
errors.pose_not_exist: 広はこの番号のポーズがないんだ！
errors.clothes_not_exist: 広はこの服を持っていないはずだ。
errors.face_not_exist: 広は絶対こんな表情をしねぇよ。
errors.generic: エラーが出てきた。絶対Rhakonのせいだ。 <:TaigaLOL:700004692079542333> - {json}

comic.description: 簡単なキャンプバディ漫画を作る
comic.usage: `comic`を実行し、そして同時にファイルをアップロードして、簡単なキャンプバディ漫画を作る。

time.description: あらゆる都市の時間を取得する
time.usage: `time <都市の名前>`を実行し、あらゆる都市の時間を取得する。

errors.length_too_short: この命令は都市の名前が必要だ。
errors.no_result: わるい、入力された名前は見当たらなかった。
